subject: Re: Grow up Frank.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Yeah, those nasty, name calling e-mails continued in private for a 
couple days. I can only guess what Grass Harp has degenerated into 
now. Even Wisteria sent her two cents worth, then blocked my e-mail 
so I couldn't reply. Oh well, stupid is as stupid does!

 Ya can't keep it friendly, so everyone can share results, and 
methods, there's always some whacko that wants to be the world's 
only expert, and no on else is allowed to do any work, or post any 
results that may make the "Expert" look bad, especially when the  
whacko "Expert" gets no contacts at all! 

 All of this being said for the benefit of any other Grass Harp 
members that may be lurking here. You'll notice, membership is still 
not screened, and posts not filtered. Anytime someone thinks the 
Princess is some weak minded fool, and can be attacked easily, all I 
can say is bring it! 

 BTW, what's stops anyone from joining multiple groups, and lists? 
I'm on a few others myself, like Unknown Country,  Darkness  On Edge 
Radio, Lightworker-Psychic-ET Hangout, and Millennium-Predictions.

 What small little minds these people have that would attack others!



 Frank
